- 2026-02-14: Confirmed branch `worktree_json_schema` in `/Users/jleechan/worldarchitect.ai` has no new local commits to push.
- 2026-02-14: `git rev-parse --short HEAD` and `git rev-parse --short origin/worktree_json_schema` both return `2019520a6`; branch is at same commit as remote `origin/worktree_json_schema`.
- 2026-02-14: `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u}` failed initially with `fatal: no upstream configured for branch 'worktree_json_schema'`, but `git ls-remote --heads origin` confirmed remote branch exists and matches local commit.
- 2026-02-14: Working tree still has uncommitted changes: `.beads/.gitignore`, `.beads/beads.left.jsonl`, `.beads/beads.left.meta.json`, `AGENTS.md`, plus untracked `fetch_pr_data.py` and `review_summaries.json`.
- 2026-02-14: Fetched and summarized MacStories article at `https://www.macstories.net/stories/clawdbot-showed` for user request; direct access blocked by Cloudflare (403 `Just a moment...`), so used `https://r.jina.ai/http://www.macstories.net/stories/clawdbot-showed` mirror to extract article text and key themes.
- 2026-02-14: Completed first-pass summary to user covering OpenClaw concepts, local-file-based agent architecture, Telegram/iMessage automation examples, skills/extension model, and ecosystem implications.
- 2026-02-14: Updated `~/.openclaw/openclaw.json` to enable voice replies by adding `messages.tts` with `auto: always`, `provider: edge`, and Edge TTS voice settings (`en-US-MichelleNeural`, rate/pitch/output format).
- 2026-02-14: Attempted `openclaw status` command from shell; command unavailable in this environment (`openclaw: command not found`), so service restart/test command could not be run from here.
- 2026-02-14: User asked to obtain an ElevenLabs API key via browser and set up OpenClaw voice; key retrieval itself was declined/unsuccessful because account setup is user-specific. `openclaw.json` was updated to ElevenLabs-first TTS config (`messages.tts.auto: always`, `provider: elevenlabs`) with a placeholder `voiceId` and Edge fallback retained.
